channel.title: Compile and Runserver help! (your you not for me)
channel.description:
this is what ur compile and runserver should look like. compile should be this..
[code]
@echo off title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause [/code]
and run server should be this
[code] @echo off title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server [/code] copy and paste this into your compile and runserver. hope this helped don't forget the rep (if it helped)

item.title: Compile and Runserver help! (your you not for me)
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

That’s only to compile and run at the same time… Also jdk may be stored in a differnt place, so you might need some thing like:

@echo off color 09 title Pimpscape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx512m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause;

Change the 09 to either 08, 07, 06, 05 or any version you got

That’s only compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: Compile and Runserver help! (your you not for me)

item.title: Compile and Runserver help! (your you not for me)
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

this is what ur compile and runserver should look like.
compile should be this…


@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server
pause

and run server should be this

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

copy and paste this into your compile and runserver. hope this helped don’t forget the rep (if it helped)

Read full topic
item.source: Compile and Runserver help! (your you not for me)
